humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that there is 1 positive lymph node out of 4 lymph nodes examined in the left axilla, levels 1 and 2. This corresponds to the N1a category in the pathologic staging. Therefore, the N stage is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has 1 out of 4 examined lymph nodes with metastatic carcinoma, as per the pathology report. Therefore, the N stage is pN1a.
